1.content: Review VoiceFlow Pro application architecture and identify gaps
1.details: Analyze the current VoiceFlow Pro codebase, UI/UX, performance bottlenecks, missing features, user experience issues, and technical limitations. Review documentation and identify areas for improvement.

2.content: Research AI ML API capabilities and integration opportunities
2.details: Explore https://aimlapi.com/ to understand available AI/ML services, APIs, and models that could enhance VoiceFlow Pro. Identify specific use cases and integration possibilities.

3.content: Create enhancement recommendations and integration plan
3.details: Based on the analysis, develop specific recommendations for improving VoiceFlow Pro, including AI ML API integration, performance optimizations, new features, and addressing identified gaps.

4.details: Implement the most critical improvements and AI API integrations to enhance VoiceFlow Pro's capabilities and address identified bottlenecks.
